channel.title: Windows API to track if file was opened/modified?
channel.description:
I am using file auditing to track if a particular file was opened/modified (4663 Event).
I get more information, about which process was used to access the file eg: notepad.exe etc.
Is there any other Windows API/function I can use to do a similar thing?

item.title: Windows API to track if file was opened/modified?
item.dc:creator: system
item.description:
This topic was automatically closed 3 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

Read full topic
item.source: Windows API to track if file was opened/modified?
